table.title: IP Addresses by Attempted User (All attempts, not just successful)

search.query: sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | search [search sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | transaction endswith="Accepted password" maxspan=60m | rex "Accepted password for (?<accepted_user>\S+) from (?<accepted_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | eval host_failed_before_success=if(accepted_ip == refused_ip, "true","false") | search host_failed_before_success="true" | stats dc(refused_ip) by refused_ip | fields + refused_ip] | stats count as "Failed Logins" by refused_ip,refused_user | sort -"Failed Logins" | rename refused_ip as "IP Address" | rename refused_user as "Attempted User"

sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | search [search sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | transaction endswith="Accepted password" maxspan=60m | rex "Accepted password for (?<accepted_user>\S+) from (?<accepted_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | eval host_failed_before_success=if(accepted_ip == refused_ip, "true","false") | search host_failed_before_success="true" | stats dc(refused_ip) by refused_ip | fields + refused_ip] | stats count as "Failed Logins" by refused_ip | sort -"Failed Logins" | rename refused_ip as "IP Address"

sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | search [search sourcetype=honeynet_5_auth | transaction endswith="Accepted password" maxspan=60m | rex "Accepted password for (?<accepted_user>\S+) from (?<accepted_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | rex "Failed password for (?<refused_user>\S+) from (?<refused_ip>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | eval host_failed_before_success=if(accepted_ip == refused_ip, "true","false") | search host_failed_before_success="true" | stats dc(refused_ip) by refused_ip | fields + refused_ip] | iplocation refused_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count by refused_ip globallimit=0
